name: Death and Taxes (itch) (easimow)
description:
The tax man cometh. And the mafia is coming, too. 

You've been employed as the mafia's new money launderer.

Your job is to funnel their money through businesses around town.

Can you avoid the crime family's wrath? And, if not, how long can you stall them while stealing their funds?

Controls:

Mouse and left click

Objective:

Steal as much money as you can before the mafia kills you! You can steal by clicking on your stash drawer in the bottom right.

Game ended up in a pretty rough spot, but hopefully it'll make you laugh once or twice. Post your scores if you'd like! Mine was Day 6 and $22 stashed!
